content.detailedDescription:
I was out counseling my friend over the phone at 2 am, i was outside the church, clear night. as we talked i gazed at the trees and an orangy red light as bright as a street lamp rose up as if it was a low helicopter, but it was a  circular reddish orb. i think to myself, "that helicopter is very low..." then as it got closer it starts swerving as if it was drunk or joy riding in a half circle loop rotations resembling an infinity symbol as it came forward. i remembered the show 'sightings' and how each ufo encounter was silent and with no sound. i took the phone away from my ear....Silence..... this was no helicopter! i quickly told my friend i had to go because i left my stove on and hung up in fear of being ridiculed since i was counseling them. the second i hung up my battery died even tho i had half a battery left. at this moment i take a closer look to see any structure,  but all i was able to see was a globe with a light texture resembling a  laser light when applied to the nail of your finger. i decided to take a chance and interact. i didn't have a flash light so i  stood  in the middle of the street under a street light and waved at it. then it stopped. the orb got bigger/ closer. at this point i ran inside the  church office since we were having a sleepover  and called out my friends. they came out and also witnessed it. it was still and kept getting smaller and smaller.  as it got smaller it pulsed....( i think due to the atmosphere the light seemed pulsing from our perspective ) until it became as tiny as a tiny far star and just did a quick woosh in an ark to the right and it was gone....

after this i would find myself gazing up at the night sky  finding stars moving, appearing /disappearing/ pulsing every so often for 2-3 months, but no sighting since then
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing orb coming forward making infinity motion stops when i wave to it  call out my friends and it  moves directly upwards to space as it pulses to a dot then wooshes out in an ark motion

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving a local restaurant and as i stepped outside, my friend and i witnessed 2 strange looking ufo's flying in unison across the sky. the objects were very high and very fast and appeared to vanish abruptly
content.summary: Witnessed 2 ufo's flying in unison. no lights, no propulsion and very fast. i was able to get a quick video before they vanished abruptly

content.detailedDescription: December 24, 2014 my husband and i made our way to st. thomas of villanova for midnight mass. being our first time at the beautiful church i had to snap a picture before going inside. i quickly looked up and snapped one picture. it wasn't till after mass and we returned home did i look at the picture and saw the three lights. i showed my husband and he was equally puzzled since we both had not seen the lights while walking up to the church. as the photo shows there were other people around but no one seemed to notice the lights.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of church peaks before evening mass and saw nothing - later when viewing pic 3 orbs were above church

content.detailedDescription: Couldn't sleep, went out to front porch to drink coffee and smoke.  saw large what i thought was a star, but 3 close together.  took great pic on my cell phone.  object in photo was triangular with a tether that was oblong, 2 other identical as on the tether sticking out from left side of craft.  stationary for about 90 min., short burst of a contrail that didn't seem to affect its position.  felt no fear, knew it wasn't anything i'd seen before.  after seeing my pic i am in awe.  found other sightings describing the exact object i saw, tether and all.  it's exciting and i keep going back to cell pic.  it's mesmerizing.  still hard to wrap my mind around it.  as the sun came up, i could no longer locate it in the sky.  the pic you won't believe if i can get it to you.  absolutely fantastic!.  i can't find any pic on your site that shows any detail.  i keep going back to it and there are no words in any language how i now feel.  i'm glad others have seen it, but the picture, i'm dumbstruck and numb when i look at it.  if it's ours it's the best kept secret.  the pic is.That good.
content.summary: Hovered for about 90 min., got excellent cell phone pic, triangular craft tethering object

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north from branson,mo on highway 65 towards springfield.At approximately 4:30pm i was heading up one of the first long straight grades on that section of the highway. i was probably a quarter of the way up the hill when i saw what looked to be a large blimp shaped object (if it was sitting on the road it would have covered both sides and the median easily) moving very rapidly to the west and slowly descending at the very top of the grade. at first i thought it was a plane but i didn't notice any wings or a tail. and for it to be as low to the ground as it was (100ft or so) something would have been seriously wrong and it surely would have crashed given the trajectory i saw.It was dark gray in appearance, there were clouds in the sky but it was mostly blue skies to the west where it was heading. as i approached the top of the hill. i looked all around to the west and slowed down quite a bit to do so. i half expected to see a fire or wreckage in the distance. i saw no signs of anything, anywhere. i saw nothing in the sky at all and you could see for miles around by that point.This was quite a busy time of day for this section of highway with many other cars traveling in both directions, there's no way i was the only person that saw this.
content.summary: Blimp size and shape moving very quickly  above the highway

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my camera. i set it down on a stool while it was still running and facing the sky. when i put the sandisk on the computer, it was full of streaks. i slowed the footage down on window's media player, where i found it was full of ufo's. my camera takes about 25 frames per second, and when i opened it on the computer, i was surprised to see so many ufo's. while looking at the video, i saw a black object come into the view. it was about the size of a basketball, and had the shape of a saucer with a dome on it. i could see the object dive and go to my left in the video. it disappeared after the second frame. as i set my camera down to check the sky once more, this extremely large, black object that was bigger than my house paused and then disappeared. i have several ufo's that are as big as a wagon wheel. they are white and dart behind the clouds and chem trails and stay there. there seem to be hundreds of them darting around, and when i pause the videos to click them frame by frame, they look to be making triangles in the sky. i have been taping them fir 2 years. i have 200 gb of ufo activity.
content.summary: Saucer with a large dome, black

content.detailedDescription: My back garden lite up i ran to windo and everything was litte up i then ran unplugged my phone from charge and went to take a picture then my phone drained instantly i rushed to put bk on charge then there was a wizzing sound then it went dark
content.summary: My full back lite up then quit hummin i went to take a pick and my battery of my phone was drained

content.detailedDescription:
On a clear early evening in newcastle ca i was chatting with my niece and her husband in the backyard of a friend. my niece was laying on a recliner and on the phone. her husband and myself were talking facing se. when we noticed something coming over the trees across the street. i said what is that? 
my memory then goes to me seeing my niece saying i've gotta go and hanging up her phone as she looked up at what we were seeing. 
we were all standing close together watching this very large silent object float directly over us and fade away as it slowly heads ne.
i try to remember what i saw and i truly can not remember what it was i was looking at. all i know is it seemed to reflect the color from the street lamps. my niece refuses to discuss it and her husband also can't really describe what we saw.  
all we know is it was not a balloon, blimp or any other object that doesn't make noise. it was a very clear, calm evening. no wind, no clouds, just this large object that i was so close to i should be able to tell you what i saw......
content.summary: A very large object floated in a straight line with no noise above the tree tops.

content.detailedDescription:
The object looked like a toy, but it was real.  it had two parts, a nose and a body.  it had a black surface, but as it blazed across the sky, you could see the outline of it as if a child had colored it black and then outlined it with a a black sharpie.  the fire caught our attention and we tried going to higher ground to view it's destination but were unable to track it.  we guessed it went over the mountains.  if it were a rocket ship, it was unusually low.  basically we were amazed. 

i believe i have a picture of a ufo in the utah desert.  it is in storage. that would be in or around 1999. it seemed to hover but in a far distance and did not attempt to come close. i will submit it if i run into it sometime.

this report is true.
content.summary: My son and i were traveling east along the belleview park area when we saw a huge rocketship traveling from east to west at an extroadinary speed.  we got out of the car to observe it.  it looked like a fat toy rocket with 2 parts.  fire at the end.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
During this day (july 27th, 2017) around 7:00am i was driving my car taking my wife to her work place when we saw in the sky towards east (sunrise) a massive object shining.

we stopped at the coordinates 25º44'54"s  53º03'15"w and looked to east where the object was. we observed it for at least 5 minutes and it was stationary/stopped.

its shape was kind of a big cigar, like a missile floating in the sky. apparently it was reflecting the sun's light. it was shining a powerful white bright light and when it started to move towards sunrise lefting a trail 2 times its own size. the trail had the same white bright light as the original stationary object.

after more 10 or 15 minutes it faded away behind some sparse clouds and disappeared completely.

this region is route for many airplanes. i observe planes a lot, specially with flightradar24 app on my iphone. at that moment, flightradar24 shows no airplane around.

believe me, i saw a lot of airplanes and at the altitude they fly they always left behind a smoke trail. the planes have a constant speed too. this object was stopped, then started to move so slowly and left no smoke trail behind but a light trail the same size of the object.

my wife captured a glimpse of the light in a video on iphone 6s of hers, but the quality is very low at maximum zoom. still, it is possible to see the faded white point in the sky at the moment it was stationary.
content.summary: Bright shape stopped in sky then start to moving until fade out

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cottage at hawkeye lake and let my dog out for a last piddle before going to bed.  at 1:10 a.M. i thought i would see if i could find any passing satellites.  sure enough, one was passing almost straight overhead going from west to east.  i was almost breaking my neck looking straight up with my body facing the north star, when from the top of my vision came another object from behind me (south) on what looked like a collision course with the first satellite.  they crossed at almost a 90 degree angle.  both were the same luminosity.  i watched both heading away from each other one going east, one going nearly due north.  i wondered to myself if there were really ufos up there when suddenly, the object going north came to a stop and seemed to hesitate in one spot for a few seconds.  i thought that was pretty strange as i have seen countless satellites over the years and i know they don't do that.  the object then reversed course 180 degrees without making a regular turn and it went from being a faint white to an almost eye hurting brilliant white/silver.  it was getting larger very quickly and changed to a brilliant gold.  when i last looked, it was about the size of a 81mg. low dose aspirin.  i had the distinct feeling that i was being targeted, almost as though my thoughts about ufos were being read. it appeared to be coming straight for me.  i grabbed my dog, ran into the cottage and locked the doors.  that is the most afraid i have been in the last 50 years. i got the distinct impression that i was being targeted.  my wife doesn't have much belief in ufos but she has never seen me so frightened in all our marriage.
content.summary: I was at 48-40-19n and 89-28-59.65w ---thought it was a satelite but it reversed course and came at me

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to green bay to work this morning, n down hwy 41 near wrightstown, which is right between brown and outagamie counties. at approximately 7:08, i noticed a silver, very bright, oval shaped object suddenly appear to the right of the hwy.  somewhat like a disc. i would guess it was less than a mile away.  it was fairly low, but higher than treetops, power lines, overpasses.  it appeared to be reflecting the sunlight.  it seemed to appear out of nowhere, and was a very bright flash in the daylight, so it caught my eye.  it hovered for a few seconds, moved slightly to my right, then slightly left again, then disappeared.  i blinked several times, somewhat in disbelief, and thought it was odd the way it appeared, then disappeared.  i kept leaning down to look out my windshield, thinking maybe it was at a different angle, and wasn't so bright without the sun reflecting, but could see nothing.  not even a speck.  the sky was fairly clear.  there were clouds at higher altitude, but at the elevation it was seen, there was clear, blue sky.  not even a speck.  a few seconds later, it reappeared, just as bright as before, but slightly closer.  it's  difficult to judge the distance it may have moved, because i was also driving toward it, and with it disappearing, i didn't witness the movement.  it seemed to hover again for a few seconds, and disappeared again.  i wasn't able to see it after that.  i was driving at approximately 75mph, and it happened so quickly, that i wasn't able to get a photo or video.  green bay is austin straubel int'l airport (grb), so i thought "it was probably a plane ascending", but i see planes on a daily basis, at different times of the day, and i've never seen them that bright, nor disappear then reappear.  when you see a plane ascending during daylight, it generally isn't reflecting light, you can generally see the clear shape of a plane, and see it the entire time, heading in one direction at a steady pace until it moves out of sight.  i found it striking enough, that when i got to work about 20 minutes later, i checked grb's flight schedule.  there was a delta flight that took off at 7:06, which i did rationalize in my head as being the right time to be the object, but had that nagging thought of "delta's planes are white (i fly delta), and wouldn't flash that brightly".  this appeared to be thicker, taller, have more mass, and far more surface reflection than a plane.  i decided to text my husband mike, because he was probably .5-1 mile ahead of me, as we left for work at the same time, and travel the same hwy for our commute.  

here is our conversation:  

me:  "did you see a plane this morning?  i swore it looked like a ufo."  
 
mike: "i was thinking the same thing! i saw a bright ball of light, then it was gone, then i saw it again, then it was gone.  really weird!  one thing to keep in mind is that there's an r/c air field right there for really big r/c planes.  i've seen some bigger than my car flying over the hwy."  ok, that's a viable possibility, in addition to the official austin straubel airport. 

me:  "yep.  me too.  i did see a flight took off at 706, but it was delta, and delta is white and not real reflective.  this looked more like a fat, silver disc.  if the sun catches a plane, you should still be able to see it when it changes angle.  it shouldn't have disappeared."

mike:  "the headlights on that thing were different than big planes.  it was coming toward me and that was the only light i could see.  i didn't see colored warning lights."

me:  "i thought it was just shiny.  couldn't tell it was lighted.  we should call mufon."  i was joking, but clearly...After thinking more about it, i find it to be serious enough to actually fill out this report.

mike:  "that's all i could see was the light.  funny that we both saw it and questioned what it was."

me:  "what was weird was the way it moved and that it disappeared and reappeared.  otherwise, i wouldn't have questioned it much."

mike:  "the disappearing thing caught me searching around too.  if i didn't have to get to work i would've pulled over & investigated."

i've seen countless objects and lights moving in the sky, and occasionally ask myself "could that have been?", but never have i thought it was valid or strange enough to tell anybody about it, and certainly not fill out a report.

note:  i'm listing one witness below, in addition to me, as my husband was driving the same hwy and saw it, but there were hundreds of cars in traveling the same hwy, so i'm sure others saw it as well.
content.summary: A silver, very bright/reflective, oval shaped object appeared, hovered, moved to the right slightly, back to the left, disappeared, then reappeared several seconds later blocks closer.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house,in my garden, at roughly midnight having a smoke and then i looked up at the night sky it was a clear night with no clouds. there was this really bright star like thing in the sky ,too bright to be a star, and then it started moving and changing direction and also moving quite fast i took out my phone and started recording this object. the object was almost star like but was really bright and stars don't move and change direction. i followed this object with my phone the whole time i could but at the end i lost sight of the object as it shot up into the sky at a high speed. i am not saying this is definitely a ufo i would like a second opinion as i feel this is definitely not a plane or a star.When i saw this object i felt excited as i've always wanted to see a ufo and the idea of something out there other than is excites me.
content.summary: I was outside at roughly midnight and i saw this bright object at first i thought it was a star and then it began moving and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a bench with my mom and dad around 22:30 hours. my dad and i were looking at the stars but he didn't see what i did. "look dad a falling star!" i said. before i will make a wish i asked my dad what a falling star looked like, because i have never seen that in my life. he said it was just a fireball that falls fast to the ground. then i asked "does it have rings?". then he said that it doesn't have any rings and that i probably saw an ufo. it had glowing 5-6 rings and was slowly moving in a circle. from the side it had some lights. this was standing in mid air between 5 to 10 seconds. but i didn't suspect that it was a ufo. i thought at the moment that it was probably some kind of plane or helicopter. then it moved really fast and disappeared west upwards. it was dark so i couldn't see anything more than that. i hope you enjoyed reading this and thank you for your attention :d
content.summary: It had glowing 5-6 rings and was slowly moving in a circle. from the side it had some lights

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 3am and went outside for a smoke. i saw a bright yellow light in the center of the big dipper in the northern sky. it went dark about 10 times over a 5 minutes, not quite flashing. the yellow ball slowly moved from west to east, then it disappeared. i went inside to get my phone to take a picture of it but the yellow ball didn't show up on it. i checked nasa's website to see if it was iss. it wasn't, but 2 days later, iss did fly over in the same location as the yellow dot but iss was a clear light that moved at a fast rate from west to east.
content.summary: Bright yellow dot was in the center of the big dipper not moving, went dark about 10 times

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the same suburban street as my own home, actually walking north/northwest heading that walk along the sidewalk with my dog at my left side. a streetlamp about 20 feet away glowed as usual but my attention was drawn by some sort of movement around the lightposf and in the nearby air. i tried to focus on the light to see what it was, assuming a bird or a bat. and, because i already had my iphone on and ready to take photos because of a beautiful crescent moon that night, i aimed it at the streetlight and just clicked the shutter button as this figure continued to swoop and twirl and glide around the light, the lamppost, crossing above the sidewalk and eventually landing twice -- once on the grass to the left side of the sidewalk and a second time in the middle of the sidewalk no more than ten feet ahead of us  in the direction we were walking. once the object moved a bit farther from the streetlight, i was able to distinguish its features; it appeared to me as a bright, glowing white orb-type of shape about the size of a softball. it was mostly round but occasionally while in flight extended a bit or had its edges grow slightly fuzzy, and it was opaque, solid and i
could not see through it. as i tried to take photos of what i originally assumed was a bat or bird, thinking how lucky i was to be able to be that close to either at night, it was when i realized the object was itself glowing with a definite outline that i began wondering what i'd really seen. we had been walking toward the area where the object was, the streetlight was coming up to our right. and once we were about ten feet away, the object swooped down from a level about parallel with the lamp of the streetlight, crossing the sidewalk in front of us as it descended before landing for perhaps ten seconds in the grass at the left side of the sidewalk. then as i watched, it ascended again to approximately 6-7' above the ground, and in a quick pattern that was almost as if tracing a question mark (a slight loop to the right then a direct descent down), it slowed just before again reaching ground level, moving in a sort of pendulum-like motion side to side inches above the ground until it came to rest directly centered in the sidewalk in front of us. 

i stared at it thinking, ok wow, this is amazing. attempted to take a photo, watching it for about ten seconds standing very still with my dog also standing totally still to my left. then, it seemed to simply vanish. 

i saw this as a bright white glowing object. in the photos i did get of it, it appears green although no filters were set on my camera at the time. in the photos, the first in particular, all lights are blurred as i was taking them while walking with my dog. but, it's the only green light that is shown in any of the three photos.
content.summary: Quick, extremely close white glowing orb approx. 4-5" moving through air near streetlamp

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the same suburban street as my own home, actually walking north/northwest heading that walk along the sidewalk with my dog at my left side. a streetlamp about 20 feet away glowed as usual but my attention was drawn by some sort of movement around the lightposf and in the nearby air. i tried to focus on the light to see what it was, assuming a bird or a bat. and, because i already had my iphone on and ready to take photos because of a beautiful crescent moon that night, i aimed it at the streetlight and just clicked the shutter button as this figure continued to swoop and twirl and glide around the light, the lamppost, crossing above the sidewalk and eventually landing twice -- once on the grass to the left side of the sidewalk and a second time in the middle of the sidewalk no more than ten feet ahead of us  in the direction we were walking. once the object moved a bit farther from the streetlight, i was able to distinguish its features; it appeared to me as a bright, glowing white orb-type of shape about the size of a softball. it was mostly round but occasionally while in flight extended a bit or had its edges grow slightly fuzzy, and it was opaque, solid and i

i saw this as a bright white glowing object. in the photos i did get of it, it appears green although no filters were set on my camera at the time. in the photos, the first in particular, all lights are blurred as i was taking them while walking with my dog. but, it's the only green light that is shown in any of the three photos.
content.summary: Quick, extremely close white glowing orb approx. 4-5" moving through air near streetlamp

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on the 429 heading to orlando at 2:16 am when i saw 5 lights in a straight line shining through the clouds. they were as big as the moon, but i could not see any objects because they were shining behind clouds. they were spaced equally, one object being able to fill the gap between the other. i figured they were spotlights from disney, but i realized disney was behind me and there was nothing else that would shine spotlights at 2 am. i kept an eye on them, but they suddenly zoomed out as fast as a meteorite travels across the sky. i couldn't see where they went the first time as i was driving.

a few moments later they zoomed back to their original formation. i put my hazards on and pulled off the road. i tried getting it on video, but it was too dark. they traveled in a straight line, but in slightly different angles so they were spaced evenly, but farther separated from each other when i looked behind me. i sat there watching them for about 10 minutes, but they finally zoomed out of view and never came back. they zoomed out and in probably 2 times in a span of 5 minutes. they mostly hovered. they disappeared for about a few minutes, but they came back and zoomed in and out for maybe another 2 or 3 times in a period of 5 minutes. i ruled out spotlights since they flew out of range that a spotlight has. it was apparent that they were behind the clouds, and not light being projected onto them.

my first reaction was curiosity. i thought they were spotlights until they moved at an incredible rate. as soon as that happened i felt an adrenaline rush. i've been interested in ufos since i was a kid. it started with an experience with seeing 3 fastwalkers at the beach, but i haven't had an experience since. not one that i could debunk at least. so seeing something that i truly had no reasonable explanation for got me crying out of excitement and fear.
content.summary: Glowing lights behind cloud hovered, then moved in similar directions at a high rate. return to original position.

content.detailedDescription:
Information previously provided re: case 85394 

original event date is earlier than attached photo.The original file reflects the time i took the photos.

if this was not an unusual sighting, please let me know. i only have one other frame to demonstrate the smaller object's movement but it is more profound. i appreciate your confidentiality. -jde
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Previously reported case#85394 : was able to provide photo

content.detailedDescription: On sunday july 16th 2017 at approximately 9:30 p.M., i was headed north on route 62 aka south park avenue, in blasdell ny. it was at this time i witnessed a ufo. i was in the passenger seat of a sedan being driven by a co-worker when i noticed something out of the periphery on my right side. i saw that it was a glowing, reddish-orangish-yellowish, teardrop shaped object. i was not able to make out any other details such as material or markings. it appeared almost as if it were on fire but without the flames. the vehicle i was in was headed north and the ufo appeared to be heading south, which initially gave the appearance that ufo was flying parallel and this caused me to lose sight of the ufo within approximately 2 to 3 seconds. i asked my co-worker if she thought that was a plane and she said in her opinion there was no way that it could be. neither of us noticed or were able to hear any type of sound coming from the ufo. we did have both of the front windows down in the vehicle. i then asked her to pull into the parking lot of a retirement home so we could circle behind the ufo. once we entered the parking lot we quickly regained a visual of the ufo and i began fumbling for my phone to capture a video. by the time i was able to get the video started the ufo was much farther away and it had completely changed its flight path to what appeared to be 90°. again, still no noise. my co-worker and i just sat and watched as it slowly faded out of eyesight.
content.summary: I witnessed a teardrop like, luminous object in the sky moving moving parallel two the ground

content.detailedDescription:
On this particular afternoon, i was in my front yard in levering, michigan. i noticed what i thought was a perfect circular aura rainbow when i also watched teardrop shapes form within the aura. at first glance, i figured it was natural but the shapes appeared to slightly change form and position. the weather that day was not out of the ordinary, maybe humid. since it was an interesting scene, i decided to take photos thinking that i was getting an unusual demonstration from the sun and atmosphere. the interior "teardrop" forms appeared to roll slightly when observed by eye. i was disappointed in my first shot (taken by a cell phone) so i took a couple more photos. these pictures are from the front yard of the property but the expanse of the subject is very large. i have two very clear pictures of this object. it is not the object itrised me. there is another "white orb" object that has moved in direction within the frames and a clear change in the larger object in shape and color in this time frame. (a smaller object moving within the expanse of the larger one.) this is all very bizarre to me. my other witness was my fiance that seemed very unimpressed with the event. however, the photos exhibit the object and at least one other inclusion to be considered; aside from the obvious changes is the larger object in response to the other in the images. i'm hoping this can be explained as a light refraction phenomenon but it's too interesting to dismiss. i have sat on these pictures for a long time, too embarrassed to share them but id rather be wrong than right. -jde     if you wish to take this seriously, feel free to contact me but only on a confidential basis. thank you. 

if there are editing errors, blame the site format!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Witnessed what i thought to be a solar-type rainbow but aura had teardop shapes inside. considered it to be natural phenomenon.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home pulling off the i-90 east exit 32 when we noticed a bluish white streak in the sky, the trail wasn't very long we thought it was a very bright shooting star at first then it suddenly stopped i was able to make out it was orb shaped for the instant it stopped it then took off in the opposite direction and looked like it was stretching becoming oval shaped and it just vanished. i got a sinking feeling in my stomach and goosebumps the first words out of my mouth we're what the f was that my wife looked at me and said was that a ufo. we can't explain what we saw, it was like nothing i've ever seen before.
content.summary: Round orb shaped object with small trail goes one direction and reverses in other direction instantly disappears

content.detailedDescription: I watched for the last 3 evenings at 530 pm. i was sitting in my deck chair on my porch as i saw white spheres of light pass overhead. they higher than a commercial air liner flys. lots of activity at naval air base which is very close to me. not sure if this is related or not.
content.summary: White spheres crossing 1a minute for 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Relaxing by the pool
i didint notice it
content.summary: I didnt notice it until i was checking my videos (go pro) a few weeks later.

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:29 am i whitnessed a bright like star in the ne sky just to the right of my neighbors tall tree. i went to get my glasses and at 5:37 i saw it was like 4-5 bright lights either a part of the same craft or very close to one another. i then saw one on the left move in a reverse comma like movement and went to the right side and joined the one on the right. but the one on the right stayed the same brightness as it joined.
at 5:54 i did not see anything else further.
content.summary: Bright white light i saw near dawn. no other stars were seen

content.detailedDescription:
Black object size of suv hovering then a red light appeared.That i recognized as a helicopter as it approached black object left quickly at high rate of speed towards the town of gold bar
i called my wife as i live near there and as i spoke to her she saw the black object leaving to the west. i will send you a video of it .
content.summary: Black object shape was unknown,  size of suv.

content.detailedDescription: One night in july 2011 in the town of stettler alberta, close to 11 or midnight, i was leaving my friends apartment and as i was getting in my car, i looked up at the apartment building in front of me and witnessed what looked like a large green ball of fire streaking across the sky. the object looked quite low, couldn't have been much more than 100ft. from where i was, the object looked to be nearly the size of a snowplow, or other large piece of machinery. the object had no defined shape as it appeared like a ball of fire. at the time, i thought it was a meteor, so i tried to find where it landed. i found no evidence of where it landed, and there were no reports in the news of meteors afterwords. it wasn't until the spring of this year (2017) that i read several stories about green fireball ufo's dating back to the 1930's, it was at this time that i realized what i actually saw.
content.summary: A large green ball of fire flew over an apartment building and overhead, continued past and beyond another building. i lost sight at that point. i tried to find a crash site as i assumed it was a meteor but nothing was found.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up at noon. blue sky and sunny with large white clouds around. went out front door to have a cig, looked up at blue sky, immediately saw a white small marble looking object in a patch of blue sky. first i thought it was a drone, due to how fast it was moving, but then realized it was far too high to be moving that fast. it was round and smooth, no edges or wings sticking out.The clouds were thick and tall, like mountains in the sky. this object was a little above the base of the clouds. it's speed was similar to if you held up a 12 inch ruler at arms length and took 2 seconds to move your finger from one end of the ruler to the other. the object was about the size of a circle, 5 millimeters tall, at arms length.  it was white, the color of the clouds exactly, except it was round, i could tell because it was slightly shaded, with the shadow of a curvature on it. it was moving in a straight path for about 5-10 seconds. i'm not good with time, so it could have been shorter or longer, i really don't know. it then changed direction, about 40 degrees, moving west to south west. it then went behind/into the large clouds and out of my sight.
the reason i’m reporting it as a ufo is because it was clearly round, no wings, or small wings or angles or edge large enough to see, it was moving at a steady rate, not up, like a balloon, but in an undistrubed forward path/motion, not being blown around, and then made an immidiate and abrupt change in direction, about 40 degrees, moving west, and then south west. it was too small and too high to be moving so fast.
content.summary: Moving at steady rate, made abrupt 40 degree change in direction.

content.detailedDescription: We were in shenandoah skyline and looked at photos later and saw object in sequence.
content.summary: Object only found on photos not by naked eye

content.detailedDescription: While traveling g down route 15 towards farmville, object appeared high in sky and remained visible for several miles.  o clouds, no visible jet trail. just appeared to remain motionless for several minutes then just vanished. appeared to be silver, metallic. just vanished in open sky. wondering if anyone else happened to see anything?
content.summary: Hovered at cloud elevation, observed for several miles at same altitude, then disappeared in a second, there and then just gone. day clear, sunny, few clouds, just vanished.
